item.title: Analysis of the top R packages
item.author: aurelien.callens@gmail.com (Aurelien Callens)
item.description: After a little while coding in Python everyday for my work, I needed to make a break and perform some R analysis! Since the beginning of my postdoc, I haven’t followed the last trends concerning R package. In this post, I am going to analyze some data about R package to see what are the most downloaded R package during the past weeks. I will also visualize all the relationships between the R package by looking at their required dependencies.
